dokku.predeploy: if [ -n "$RUN_MIGRATIONS"]; then bundle exec rake db:migrate; fi
dokku.postdeploy: if [ -n "$SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL" ]; then JSON_STRING="{\"text\":\"[<$GIT_REV|https://github.com/jcraigk/biz-kudochest/commit/$GIT_REV>] deployed\"}"; curl -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' --data "$JSON_STRING" $SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL; fi
